titleStmt.title: A faithful account of a great engagement which lately happened betwixt Their Majesties ship the Pembrooke and two French men of war upon the coast of France with a particular relation of the famous encounter that was betwixt our English sea men, that landed there, and five hundred of the French militia : also, an account of the plunder and other particulars.
titleStmt.author: M. C.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
